description: Users of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) may experience issues related to full-screen functionality following updates, as indicated by the resolution of vulnerability CVE-2023-5487. These issues could manifest as unexpected failures to enter full-screen mode or improper display behavior when full-screen is activated. This problem has been addressed in the latest build version 118.0.2088.46, detailed in KB-118.0.2088.46, ensuring that users no longer face these full-screen conflicts.
